text: Ra timiharumadhye juna manisaharu marchan ra (aphna pachadi) svasniharu chodchan bhane ti svasniharule cara mahina dasa dinasam'ma aphula'i roki rakhun. Ra jaba (yi) iddata pura garisakeka hunchan taba aphna hitama je cahanchan garchana bhane yasama timila'i kunai gunaha chaina ra allaha timra sampurna kriyakalapako janakari rakhdcha
